metadata.description: CryptoRastas & the legendary rasta skateboarder Adelmo Jr. presents:  Skate deck IRL+NFT! Only 100 decks, registred on blockchain. The final colors of the skateboard you minted will be revealed soon! Don't forget to redeem your NFT to receive at your address the IRL Skate.
metadata.name: CryptoRastas X Plural Skate #00001
